| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | versions.props is only loaded once | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/948 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | The `--hash` argument of the `why` task now accepts multiple, comma-separated hashes. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/916 |
_Automated release, no documented user facing changes_

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Annotation processors are no longer included in locked configurations by default | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/871 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | The `annotationProcessor` configuration is now included in the locked configurations. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/862 |
_Automated release, no documented user facing changes_

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Provide constraints for java libraries in the same repo, behind experimental feature flag: `com.palantir.gradle.versions.publishLocalConstraints` | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/825 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | Revert "Provide constraints for java libraries in the same repo (#815)" | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/821 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Provide constraints for java libraries in the same repo | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/815 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | Add workaround to prevent ConcurrentModificationException when interacting with spotless | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/812 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Drop noisy gcv logging to debug level | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/804 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Break | Handle Gradle 7 removing default configurations. Increase minimum required Gradle version to 6.1. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/721 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | A new `writeVersionsLocks` task that allows writing out the `versions.lock` without running `--write-locks` and possibly triggering expensive code paths from other gradle plugins. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/723 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | Fix the `checkUnusedConstraints` task to delay throwing an error about incomplete configuration due to configure-on-demand until the task is actually run. This fixes some situations in which the task is instantiated but not run. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/725 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Add compatibility with Gradle configuration-on-demand | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/657 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Add property to skip writing lock file | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/613 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | Fix versions-props plugin regression from #557 (1.26.0) in some circumstances | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/576 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Manage lock file constraints using a single gradle "platform", reducing the number of constraints that have to be created. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/557 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Support cycles in dependency graph | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/537 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Check unused constraints can be up-to-date. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/522 |
_No documented user facing changes_

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Expose all lock file constraints as derived from `versions.lock` in all publications derived from `components.java`. This will most likely produce surprising behaviour when publishing module metadata! However, we are not using it internally for now, and we are planning a better solution that addresses the problems with the current implementation. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/504 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Expose all lock file constraints as derived from `versions.lock` in all publications derived from `components.java`. This will most likely produce surprising behaviour when publishing module metadata! However, we are not using it internally for now, and we are planning a better solution that addresses the problems with the current implementation. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/504 |
_Automated release, no documented user facing changes_

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | Properly handle cycles in the dependency graph when determining scope | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/491 |

| Type | Description | Link | | ---- | ----------- | ---- | | Improvement | This change relaxes the precondition constraint that checks that configure-on-demand is disabled. We now only require it to be disabled when running the "verifyLocks" task, or when invoked with "--write-locks".
This gives projects more flexibility to flag on configure-on-demand in certain scenarios where it might make sense. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/489 |
_Automated release, no documented user facing changes_

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | Dependencies depended on with single version range constraints (like `[1.27.1]`, used extensively by `io.grpc` dependencies) should no longer cause `versions.lock` generation inconsistencies between different machines. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/428 |

name: 1.17.3-rc1
body:
| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | `io.grpc` dependencies should no longer cause `versions.lock` generation inconsistencies between different machines. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/428 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | Fix regression in 1.14.0 so that checkUnusedConstraints stops trying to resolve legacy java configurations. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/419 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | versions.props validation errors mention versions.props | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/417 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Fail to parse a versions.props file if there are duplicate constraints | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/396 |
_No documented user facing changes_

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | Fix a potential exception `Expected to only find one target configuration but found 0 with names: []` in GCV 1.13.0+. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/386 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Validate that versions.props entries are well formed | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/375 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Add `checkUnusedConstraints` task which will ensure that the set of constraints in the versions.props file is minimal. Calling the task with `--fix` will automatically remove any unnecessary constraints. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/365 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | Fix bug in 1.13.0 with Gradle 6 where it would crash if you had dependencies with an explicit extension/classifier anywhere in your locked configurations. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/347 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Fail if _any_ projects share the same group:name coordinate. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/188 |
| Fix | `gradle-consistent-versions` now supports Gradle 6.0. The minimum required Gradle version has been raised to 5.3 | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/343 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | Fix potential deadlock between generatePomFile tasks - a regression introduced in 1.12.0 by #193. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/227 |

| Type | Description | Link | | ---- | ----------- | ---- | | Fix | Fixes regression introduced in 1.12.0 where you might get a gradle error like the following:

`Cannot change dependencies of configuration ':foo:runtimeElements' after it has been included in dependency resolution.` | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/243 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | Fix regression where we were failing if an excluded configuration is resolved early. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/237 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | Fix missing versions in POMs of MavenPublications. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/218 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Properly remove versions.props constraints from being published. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/193 |

| Type | Description | Link | | ---- | ----------- | ---- | | Fix | Fix regression from 1.11.0 where non-locked configurations could not resolve a `platform()` dependency if its constraint was declared using a `*` in `versions.props`.

Example:
```
Could not resolve all files for configuration ':some-api:conjureJava'.
> Could not find com.palantir.witchcraft:witchcraft-core-bom:.
``` | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/197 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | Fix error writing lock file in the presence of platform dependencies coming from `rootConfiguration`. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/195 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Feature | Publish constraints from versions.lock filtered by the transitive closure of dependencies for each project. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/191 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Only throw on configurations using `resolutionStrategy.failOnVersionConflict()` if they are locked. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-consistent-versions/pull/187 |
[fix] Re-allow importing from IntelliJ (#152)
[fix] Prevent placeholder configuration being resolved accidentally (#150)

* [feature] lock test dependencies (#141)
* [fix] Fail if configure-on-demand (#145)
- [improvement] Make dependency sourcing more robust (#134)
* [fix] Fix locked versions feeding back into new lock state (#125)
* [improvement] Move lock verification to a `verifyLocks` task that `check` depends on (#123)
* [fix] Resolve lock state the same whether writing locks or not (#122)

- [improvement] Make "dependents changed" error more readable (#116)
- [fix] Fix inconsistency of dependents for some direct dependencies (#119)
- [improvement] support getVersion with 3 args (#98)
[improvement] Don't apply / depend on configuration-resolver #95
* [fix] check minimum gradle version (#90)
- [fix] Improved error message when getVersion fails (#87)
[improvement] Fail the build if `versions.lock` is missing (#75)

_This release is essentially the same as 1.1.2_

Revert "[improvement] improve errors on non bom platforms (#70)" (#73)
[improvement] improve errors when declaring a platform dependency on a module that is not a BOM (#70)
[fix] Allow dependency insight even if there are unresolvable dependencies #57
[fix] VersionsPropsPlugin always creates `rootConfiguration`, even if `versions.props` doesn't exist (#52)

[improvement] Include platform dependencies in the lock file (#42)

We now include platforms (e.g. BOMs) in the lock file.
If you are using [platform dependencies](https://docs.gradle.org/5.2.1/userguide/managing_transitive_dependencies.html#sec:bom_import), a `./gradlew --write-locks` will be necessary in order for their lock file to pick up the platforms that were previously being filtered out.

- [improvement] improve getVersion error message (#32) 

_We recognise this plugin is now used in production, so will endeavour to communicate any breaks with a major rev._
- [improvement] `getVersion(String, String)` signature allows easier adoption (#27)

- [improvement] Full stacktrace of resolution exceptions when -S (#13) 
- [fix] `--write-locks` no longer fails under certain pathological conditions (#20)
- [feature] New `getVersion(String, Configuration)` function (#8)
